body_html: We have always been doing the write check. The problem is that touching only the first element will not catch all errors, since the OS is allocating the pages lazily and will send the bus error only once it runs out of them.

body: [We have always been doing the `write` check](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/TH/THAllocator.c#L324-L333). The problem is that touching only the first element will not catch all errors, since the OS is allocating the pages lazily and will send the bus error only once it runs out of them.
